items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates must have a latency of less than 2 seconds.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to communicate about tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within the app.
Chat history is stored and accessible for at least 30 days.
non_functional: Messages should be delivered with less than 1 second latency.
Chat service uptime must be at least 99.9%.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core features include real-time updates and chat for collaboration. Additional features like file sharing, task assignment, and notifications may be needed.
